name: devinfra-ops-hub
description: GitOps control plane for managing preview environments

scripts.dev: concurrently "docker-compose up -d postgres redis" "turbo run dev"
scripts.db:push: cd apps/api && npx prisma db push
scripts.db:migrate: cd apps/api && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.setup: pnpm install && pnpm db:generate && pnpm db:push && pnpm db:seed
